verses.verse: Then <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> you the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> To <S%H4279>morrow<s%> about this <S%H6256>time<s%> shall a <S%H5429>measure<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> be sold for a <S%H8255>shekel,<s%> and two <S%H5429>measures<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> for a <S%H8255>shekel,<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>

Then a <S%H7991>lord<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8172>leaned<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> if the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> would <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H699>windows<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> might <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> be? And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> it with your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> but shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof.

And there were <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6879>leprous<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> at the <S%H6607>entering<s%> in of the <S%H8179>gate:<s%> and they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H7453>another,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H3427>sit<s%> we <S%H6311>here<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> we <S%H4191>die?<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> we <S%H559>say,<s%> We will <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> then the <S%H7458>famine<s%> is in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and we shall <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H8033>there:<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> we <S%H3427>sit<s%> still <S%H6311>here,<s%> we <S%H4191>die<s%> also. <S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H3212>come,<s%> and let us <S%H5307>fall<s%> to the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians:<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> they <S%H2421>save<s%> us <S%H2421>alive,<s%> we shall <S%H2421>live;<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> they <S%H4191>kill<s%> us, we shall but <S%H4191>die.<s%>

And they <S%H6965>rose<s%> up in the <S%H5399>twilight,<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians:<s%> and when they were <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H7097>uttermost<s%> part of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H758>Syria,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

For the <S%H136>LORD<s%> had made the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> a <S%H6963>noise<s%> of <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and a <S%H6963>noise<s%> of <S%H5483>horses,<s%> even the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2428>host:<s%> and they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another,<s%> <S%H2009>See,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H7936>hired<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> us the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> on us.

Why they <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H5127>fled<s%> in the <S%H5399>twilight,<s%> and <S%H5800>left<s%> their <S%H168>tents,<s%> and their <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and their <S%H2543>asses,<s%> even the <S%H4264>camp<s%> as it was, and <S%H5127>fled<s%> for their <S%H5315>life.<s%>

And when <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6879>lepers<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H7097>uttermost<s%> part of the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> they <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H168>tent,<s%> and did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and <S%H5375>carried<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H899>raiment,<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> and <S%H2934>hid<s%> it; and <S%H7725>came<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H935>entered<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H168>tent,<s%> and <S%H5375>carried<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> also, and <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H2934>hid<s%> it.

Then they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H7453>another,<s%> We <S%H6213>do<s%> not <S%H3651>well:<s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is a <S%H3117>day<s%> of good <S%H1309>tidings,<s%> and we <S%H2814>hold<s%> our <S%H2814>peace:<s%> if we <S%H2442>tarry<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H216>light,<s%> some <S%H5771>mischief<s%> will <S%H4672>come<s%> on us: <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore <S%H3212>come,<s%> that we may <S%H935>go<s%> and <S%H5046>tell<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>household.<s%>

So they <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> to the <S%H7778>porter<s%> of the <S%H5892>city:<s%> and they <S%H5046>told<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> We <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> but <S%H5483>horses<s%> <S%H631>tied,<s%> and <S%H2543>asses<s%> <S%H631>tied,<s%> and the <S%H168>tents<s%> as they were.
And he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H7778>porters;<s%> and they <S%H5046>told<s%> it to the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H6441>within.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> in the <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> I will <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H5046>show<s%> you <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> have <S%H6213>done<s%> to us. They <S%H3045>know<s%> that we be <S%H7456>hungry;<s%> therefore are they <S%H3318>gone<s%> out of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to <S%H2247>hide<s%> themselves in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>When<s%> they <S%H3318>come<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> we shall <S%H8610>catch<s%> them <S%H2416>alive,<s%> and <S%H935>get<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the city.

And <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Let some <S%H3947>take,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H2568>five<s%> of the <S%H5483>horses<s%> that <S%H7604>remain,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H7604>left<s%> in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H2009>(behold,<s%> they are as <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that are <S%H7604>left<s%> in it: <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I say, they are even as <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> that are <S%H8552>consumed:<s%>) and let us <S%H7971>send<s%> and <S%H7200>see.<s%>

They <S%H3947>took<s%> therefore <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7393>chariot<s%> <S%H5483>horses;<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3212>Go<s%> and <S%H7200>see.<s%>

And they <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them to <S%H3383>Jordan:<s%> and, <S%H2009>see,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> was <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H899>garments<s%> and <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> had <S%H7993>cast<s%> away in their <S%H2648>haste.<s%> And the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out, and <S%H962>spoiled<s%> the <S%H4264>tents<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians.<s%> So a <S%H5429>measure<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> was sold for a <S%H8255>shekel,<s%> and two <S%H5429>measures<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> for a <S%H8255>shekel,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6485>appointed<s%> the <S%H7991>lord<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> he <S%H8172>leaned<s%> to have the <S%H5921>charge<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7429>stepped<s%> on him in the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and he <S%H4191>died,<s%> as the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H1696>said,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> when the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to him.

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass as the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Two <S%H5429>measures<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> for a <S%H8255>shekel,<s%> and a <S%H5429>measure<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a <S%H8255>shekel,<s%> shall be to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> about this <S%H6256>time<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria:<s%>

And that <S%H7991>lord<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Now, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> should <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H699>windows<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> might <S%H2088>such<s%> a <S%H1697>thing<s%> be? And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> it with your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> but shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof.
And <S%H3651>so<s%> it <S%H1961>fell<s%> out to him: for the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7429>stepped<s%> on him in the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and he <S%H4191>died.<s%>
